page.title: 07Games We Like To Play. (2)
page.content: { {Double Dare Hopscotch.} Two captains and two teams of at least 3 in each team are needed. Draw out a pattern of nine squares alternately putting one square then two squares until nine squares have been drawn. Toss a coin to see which team goes first. Throw any small stone lying around to land on a number. Jump into the squares first one foot then two feet, alternating, and missing the square the stone landed in. If your foot accidentally lands in this square you are out and the captain of the other team double dares you to carry out a difficult task. If you carry out the task you are awarded a point for your team.
